name: radio-node
description: simple app to demonstrate usage of joynr

scripts.startconsumer: domain=$npm_package_config_domain runtime=$npm_package_config_runtime cchost=$npm_package_config_cc_host ccport=$npm_package_config_cc_port bounceProxyBaseUrl=$npm_package_config_bounceProxyBaseUrl brokerUri=$npm_package_config_brokerUri ts-node src/main/js/radioConsumer
scripts.startprovider: domain=$npm_package_config_domain runtime=$npm_package_config_runtime cchost=$npm_package_config_cc_host ccport=$npm_package_config_cc_port bounceProxyBaseUrl=$npm_package_config_bounceProxyBaseUrl brokerUri=$npm_package_config_brokerUri ts-node src/main/js/radioProvider
